EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Boston Open House
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/open-house/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=boston-open-house]]> Please join us for a day of innovation and education.
Wednesday March 16, 2016
reception 6-9 We look forward to having you joining us.
Kindly RSVP as space is limited for this special event.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
